entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
